title: ArtyTorrent Pack 84-Loopmasters Prdcr Essntls pt2-Drum Oneshots
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 84-Loopmasters Prdcr Essntls pt2-Drum Oneshots
---------------------------------------------------------------

LM PE part 2: Drum kit Oneshots.

Loopmasters Producers Essentials is an excellent resource for musicians working in a range of genres. The full retail package contains loops, oneshots, MIDI files, and plug-in presets in a variety of formats. If you make money from music, I recomend you buy a copy. <a href="
http://www.loopmasters.com/sampleshop/10Expand.asp?ProductCode=LMOS_04" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.loopmasters.com/sampleshop/10Expand.asp?ProductCode=LMOS_04</a>

This pack follows on from the drum and perc loops included in ArtyTorrent Pack 83. Here we have 16 folders of drumkits, along with presets for Kontakt, Logic EXS, Halion, and Reason.
Unfortunately, the kits don&#039;t always follow the standard GM mapping, although the main kick drum of each on is on middle C. Feel free to re-map the kits in your sampler of choice, or use the samples as oneshots.

Torrent contains 16 RAR files with 246 samples
----------------------------------------------
Alesis hr 16, Dance Kit, Dance Kit 2, DnB Kit, Electro Kit, Funk Kit, FX kit, Hip Hop Kit, House Kit, Indian Percussion, Korg DDM 110, Live Kit, Percussion, RnB Kit, Roland TR-808 (25 kicks and 25 snares), Roland TR-909.

All files are normalized and acidized oneshot 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. 

--
Arty - "Kick it!"
23rd February 2008.

P.S. Other parts of the LM PE CD will posted at a later date, as I have other priorities right now.
